title: Twitter reacts to Greg Hardy's win, use of inhaler against Ben Sosoli at UFC on ESPN 6
text:
Gallery Greg Hardy def. Ben Sosoli at UFC on ESPN 6: Best photos view 10 images

Greg Hardy added another win to his UFC record on Friday when he defeated Ben Sosoli at UFC on ESPN 6 – but it wasn’t without strangeness.

Hardy (6-1 MMA, 3-1 UFC), the controversial former NFL standout, defeated octagon newcomer Sosoli (7-3 MMA, 0-1 UFC) by unanimous decision in their heavyweight bout, which took place at TD Garden in Boston and aired on ESPN2. There of course, was some controversy attached, when Hardy used an inhaler between the second and third round.

Check below for the top Twitter reactions to Hardy’s victory over Sosoli at UFC on ESPN 6.
